name: VR Roller Coaster Virtual Reality Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Roller Coaster Virtual Reality Google Cardboard
description:
Ride an amazing and thrilling Roller Coaster in virtual reality on your Google Cardboard mobile VR headset!

This game works for both Google Cardboard, as well as many other mobile VR headsets.

Learn more about Google Cardboard here: https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

The music in this game is DOCTOR VOX - Sub Warriors
